# Privacy Policy

Last updated:

November 8, 2023

This Privacy Policy describes the categories of information that HeyAutofill,
Inc., the makers of Magical (together with its current or future subsidiaries,
“Magical”, “we”, “our” or “us”) collect from visitors to and users of the
[**https://www.getmagical.com/**](https://www.getmagical.com/) website (the
“Site”) and any web-based, computer based or mobile application (each an
“App”) or any computer software downloaded or otherwise made available from
the Site (the “Software” and together with the Site and App, the “Service”).

The
information we collect and the purposes for which we use or disclose or share
it will depend to some extent on how you use the Service and how you interact
with us.

**WHAT INFORMATION WE COLLECT**

We collect the following types of information:

  * Contact information, such as your name, email address, company or business organization where you work and job function.
* Account login or verification information (including, if applicable, third-party account information for login purposes).
* To the extent you pay for any of our Services, financial information, such as payment card information (e.g.

* Text, information or other content you submit to us, publish or save (“Shortcut Command Data”) when using the “shortcut” function (“Shortcuts”) of the Services (e.g., if you create Shortcut for “brb” to expand to “be right back”, both the Shortcut and the expanded text are considered Shortcut Command Data and collected and stored by us).
* Location information, including geolocation when using the Service.
* Electronic, audio, visual, or similar information, such as your communications with us or photos, videos, or other content you submit to us or publish in connection with the Service.
* Other information that identifies or can be reasonably associated with you in connection with your use of the Service.
* Internet or other network or device activity, such as information about the browsers and devices you use to access the Service and any emails and other marketing activities from us (e.g.

device type, browser type and language, hardware model, operating system version, unique device identifiers, and IP address), how you interact with the Service and any emails or marketing activities from us (e.g.

features used, content viewed, addresses of referring websites, and the dates and times of interactions), information from your computer or other device about the activities you perform when using the Service including other software you are using and (provided that you have not opted out of certain features) information and content on the webpages or websites you visit and view while using the Services.

**HOW WE COLLECT INFORMATION**

We collect the types of information described above in four ways: (1) when you
provide it to us; (2) when you use the Services, (3) when we collect it
automatically; and (4) and when we receive it from other sources.
‍ _Information you provide to us_.

You provide information to us when you register for an account, use the
Service, communicate with us, or otherwise submit or publish your information.

For example, when you register for an account, you may provide contact
information, account login or verification information, demographic
information, information about your employer or business organization where
you work, and financial information.

When using the Service, you may provide
additional demographic information, financial information, geolocation, or
other information about yourself.

You might also provide information when
communicating with us (for example, regarding the Service or when seeking
technical support).
‍ _Information we collect as you use the Services_.

As you use the Services, we collect and store Shortcut Command Data from you
as you use the Shortcuts function to ensure your Shortcut Command Data is not
lost.

Additionally, as you use the Services, we collect Information Type Data
from you based on your usages of the Service.

Unless you have opted out of
particular services or features, the underlying content and information that
you copy and paste or otherwise transfer while using the Services (“Variable
Content”) are collected and processed by us so that we can enhance the product
experience and the functionality of the Service**.

If you do not wish for us to collect or process
your Variable Content, you may opt out of this feature by emailing us at
[**trust@getmagical.com**](mailto:trust@getmagical.com).

‍  
‍ _Automatically collected information_.

We automatically collect internet or other network or device activity
information about your interactions with the Service, emails, and
advertisements, even if you are not logged into an account with us.

This
information may be collected as follows:

• Cookies and similar technologies.
* Cookies allow us to collect information such as browser type, time spent on the Service, pages visited, and language preferences.

In addition, we use cookies to gather statistical information about usage of the Service in order to improve their design and functionality, understand how they are used, and assist us with resolving questions about them.
* To better understand how users engage with the Service, we use third-party analytics services that use cookies and similar technologies.

These third parties may collect information about your online activities over time and across third-party websites, and they may be members of industry self-regulatory groups such as the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI), Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA), and European Digital Advertising Alliance (eDAA).
* We may collect information about the location of your device, including precise geolocation information from your device and imprecise location from, for example, your IP address.
* We may collect information about your transactions with us.

_Information we receive from other sources  
  
‍_We may collect information from other sources, including business partners
and service providers with whom we work.

We may anonymize or aggregate any of the information we collect and use it for
any purpose, including for research and product-development purposes.

**THIRTY-PARTY APPS AND PLUGINS**

Some third-party applications and services that work with Magical and the
Service may ask for permission to access your information.

Some third parties’ embedded content or plugins on our Site and/or Software,
such as Facebook “Like” buttons, may allow their operators to learn that you
have visited the Site, and they may combine this knowledge with other data
they have collected about your visits to other websites or online services
that can identify you.

Data collected by third parties through these apps and plugins is subject to
each parties’ own policies.

**CHILDREN 'S PRIVACY**

We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under age
13.

**STORAGE**

Your personal information that we collect is stored on servers in various
locations, including the United States.

If you have elected to receive email communications from us, we retain
information about your email preferences until you opt out of receiving these
email communications and in accordance with our policies.

You should make sure you are comfortable with what information from or about
you may be disclosed to, shared with or collected by a social networking
service.

For what information is disclosed, shared or collected and how it is
used, please carefully review the social networking service’s privacy policy
and terms and conditions and modify your privacy settings directly on that
service.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy also explains how Magical may use, disclose or share and
protects such information, as well as your choices regarding it.

The
information we collect and the purposes for which we use or disclose or share
it will depend to some extent on how you use the Service and how you interact
with us.

**HOW WE SHARE THE INFORMATION WE COLLECT**

We will not sell your information to data brokers or other third parties for
money.

We may, however, share your information as follows:

• In connection with the services offered through the Service.

* Depending on your settings, choices, and uses of the Service, the information you submit to us may be disclosed to third parties, including other Magical users, to provide requested services to you or interact with you through the Services.
• Parent companies, affiliates, and subsidiaries.
* We may share your information among our related business entities.
• Service providers, vendors, and other business partners.

* We may share your information with third parties with whom we work to provide, improve, or develop the Service or other products or services; to perform other Website- and App-related services; or to assist us in analyzing how the Service or other products or services are used.

* For example, we may work with vendors providing website hosting; data analysis; other technology services; payment processing; fraud monitoring; services related to product development and maintenance; and communications, marketing, and online and offline advertising services.

* We may share your information with third parties when we have a good faith belief that disclosure is necessary to: obtain legal advice or establish, exercise, or defend legal claims; comply with laws, regulatory requirements, contractual obligations, court orders, or other legal process or obligations, or lawful requests from public and government authorities; detect, prevent, or respond to fraud, intellectual property infringement, security issues, violations of our agreements or law, or other misuse of the Service or other products or services; protect the safety, rights, welfare, or property of Magical, you, or others, as required or permitted by applicable law.

* We may share your information with third parties in connection with any reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer, or other disposition of all or any portion of our business, assets, or stock (including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings).
* We may share your information with third parties when we have your consent to do so.
* We may share anonymized, de-identified or aggregated information internally and with third parties for any purpose.

Magical's use and transfer to any other app of information received from
Google APIs will adhere to [Google API Services User Data
Policy](https://developers.google.com/terms/api-services-user-data-policy),
including the [Limited Use ](https://developers.google.com/terms/api-services-
user-data-policy#additional_requirements_for_specific_api_scopes)requirements.

Such personal information may be
disclosed in response to inquiries or requests from government authorities in
the countries in which we operate.

United States federal and state
governments, courts or law enforcement or regulatory agencies may be able to
obtain disclosure of your information through laws applicable in the United
States.

By using the Service, you understand that your information can be
transferred to countries outside of your country of residence, including the
United States, which may have data protection rules that are different from
those of your country.

You can withdraw your consent to our use, disclosure or sharing of your
information at any time by emailing us at**** trust@getmagical.com.

You should make sure you are comfortable with what information from or about
you may be disclosed to, shared with or collected by a social networking
service.

For what information is disclosed, shared or collected and how it is
used, please carefully review the social networking service’s privacy policy
and terms and conditions and modify your privacy settings directly on that
service.
